title: Server Transfer
body: So I've moved to England for school, and I'm thinking about transfering to EUW, however, I'm not sure whether or not I keep my friends list after I transfer back for summer break. I'm aware that I won't have my friends list while I'm on EUW, but I'm just wondering if I'll keep it when I transfer back to NA.

replies.body: Your friends list will be there when you get back.  If nothing else you can always copy and paste your friends names into a google doc to be extra careful.
